numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The title is: Is the world a good place for some people?
2. I notice a group of people.
3. The people in this group say that the world is getting better.
4. Many people in this group are younger people.
5. Many people in this group live in poorer countries.
6. I think that this may be because these people have less greed than wealthier people.
7. I think that this may be because these people want less than wealthier people.
8. I wonder why people in poorer countries think that the world is becoming a better place.
9. I wonder why wealthier people think that the world is a bad place.
10. This graph does not relate to me.
11. I am not in that age group.
